definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: Her mother, Maribel , had won the U. S figure skating championship nine times.
sentences.chinese: 母親瑪麗貝爾曾九次將美國花樣滑冰冠軍收入囊中。

sentences.english: I’m going to be an Olympic figure skater.
sentences.chinese: 米奇說，“我要成爲奧運會的花樣滑冰運動員。”

sentences.english: The crash devastated the U.S. figure skating community.
sentences.chinese: 那次空難重創了美國花樣滑冰界。

sentences.english: And the artistic expression of both skating and music has helped her too.
sentences.chinese: 花樣滑冰和音樂的藝術表現對她也很有幫助。

sentences.english: Analysis of Types of Sports injuries in Elite Chinese Ice-hockey Players;
sentences.chinese: 我們有世界上最棒的花樣滑冰運動員和冰球隊。

sentences.english: That night, he took her to see a figure-skating competition at the Palace of Sports.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，他帶她去體育館觀看了花樣滑冰比賽。

sentences.english: She has won the South Korean National Figure Skating 3)title five times.
sentences.chinese: 她還曾五次奪得韓國全國花樣滑冰賽的冠軍。

sentences.english: Kwan continues to perform in skating exhibitions.
sentences.chinese: 同時關穎珊繼續參加各種花樣滑冰表演賽。

sentences.english: One important element in pairs figure skating is the lift.
sentences.chinese: 在花樣滑冰雙人滑中，託舉是一個重要元素。

sentences.english: They have the best figure skaters and the best ice hockey teams in the world.
sentences.chinese: 他們有世界上最棒的花樣滑冰運動員和冰球隊。

sentences.english: The action of jumping up is seen as the technical core of free skating of figure skating.
sentences.chinese: 跳躍動作是花樣滑冰自由滑動作技術的核心。
